pros: High, consistent damage throughout every stage of the game
Does not suffer from animation lock (end delay) on their skills

Lots of mobility
  • Able to reposition and dodge boss attacks
  • Can traverse the map quickly
Capable of tanking one-hit KOs and super knockbacks
cons: Requires good character control and practice
Short range on main attack skills

extraContent.title: Gauge and Combo Mechanics
extraContent.content:
Referenced from Repentant

Ammo Resource:

A resource required to use Revolving Cannon and Detonate. Once your Ammo resource is depleted, you will need to reload which is done automatically when your Ammo is empty

Dynamo Gauge:

This resource is exclusively used to activate Bunker Buster Explosion. You gain one Dynamo Gauge bar whenever you use Revolving Cannon. Once is used, you enter an Overheat state where your gauge is set to max but you cannot charge the Dynamo Gauge or use

Charge Skills:

Skills with a 'C' on the Skill Icon are Charge Skills. These skills can be held and charged while using other skills. When fully charged, releasing these Charge Skills while using other skills will cancel that skill and instead activate the Charge Skill and create an additional shockwave attack. This is used for Animation Canceling There are four Charge Skills:

  • Bobbing [2nd Job]
  • Weaving [3rd Job]
  • Hammer Smash [3rd Job]
  • Hyper Magnum Punch [Hyper Skill]

Bobbing and Weaving are your main Charge Skills that are used mainly for Animation Canceling. Although, they cannot cancel all skills like Ballistic Hurricane's uppercut, Bullet Blast's rush, and Decent Skill buffs While charging, attacks won't knock you back. You can hold up to 2 Charge skills at once. The charging animation is invisible and an orange aura will surround your character when the Charge skill is ready

primary.name: Crystal Throw
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 7, Damage: 40
primary.desc: Throws a rock that deals fixed damage

primary.name: Infiltrate
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 15, Hide for 30 sec, Movement Speed: +15
primary.desc: Makes you invisible similar which when activated, you cannot hit or be hit by enemies similar to Dark Sight

primary.name: Potion Mastery
primary.shortDesc: Recovery Rate: +115%

primary.name: Secret Assembly
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 100, you move to the Resistance Secret Plaza\nCooldown: 600 sec

primary.name: Magnum Punch
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 12, Enemies Hit: 6, Damage: 75%, Number of Attacks: 3.\nUsing Revolving Cannon while using Magnum Punch will additionally attack the same number of enemies for 40% damage 3 times.
primary.desc: Punches forward
details: Can use Revolving Cannon while attacking

primary.name: Revolving Cannon
primary.shortDesc: Uses 1 Ammo, and your Ammo is reloaded if used as a key-down skill
primary.desc: Consumes 1 Ammo to create an additional explosive attack
details:
Cannot be used on its own and must be combined with other skills
  • Can be used on skills with a 'F' on the Skill Icon
Charges your Dynamo Gauge by 1
Holding down the Skill Key will manually reload your Ammo

primary.name: Bunker Buster Explosion
primary.shortDesc: Requires 3 or more Dynamo Gauge bars. Attack up to 10 enemies for 100% damage 8 times. Melee hits ignore 80% of enemy Defense Rate.\nReleases Shockwave 1, attacking up to 10 enemies for 50% damage 6 times.\nAfter use, you will Overheat for 7 sec. While Overheated, the Dynamo Gauge is set to max, and you cannot charge the Dynamo Gauge or use Bunker Buster Explosion. On ending, depletes the Dynamo Gauge.
primary.desc: Depletes all of your Dynamo Gauge to release a massive explosion
details: Requires 3 or more Dynamo Guage bars to use
Attack has increased %Ignore DEF
After using, you will Overheat briefly which sets your Dynamax Gauge to max but you cannot charge the Dynamo Gauge or use

primary.name: Double Jump
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 5, allows you to jump a greater distance
primary.desc: Double jump skill
details: Can be assigned a Key Slot or activated by pressing jump twice
Some players may not put SP into this to gain better control of other mobile abilities

primary.name: Detonate
primary.shortDesc: Ammo Cost: 1, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Damage: 155%, Number of Attacks: 2
primary.desc: Fires your cannon, recoiling you backward
details:
Using this Skill while in the air holding the Up Arrow Key will propel you upward
  • Unaffected by Damage Reflect
  • Skill cannot be used while reloading

primary.name: Blast Shield
primary.shortDesc: When hit, converts 30% of your damage taken into a protective shield. 40% + 50 of the shield dissipates every 5 second. The maximum strength of the shield is equal to your Max HP.\nKnockback Resistance increases by 100% while using Blaster skills.\nPermanently increases Knockback Resistance by 40%, DEF by 200, and Max HP by 20%.
primary.desc: When hit, you convert a portion of the damage taken into a shield that slowly disappears
details: Additionally, when using Blaster skills, you gain 100% Knockback Resistance
[Passive]: Permanently increases %Knockback Resistance, %Max HP and grants flat DEF

primary.name: Revolving Cannon Mastery
primary.shortDesc: [Final Attack Type Skill] When the Dynamo Gauge has at least 1 stock, direct attacks from the Arm Cannon will trigger additional attacks which deal 75% 1 times. For each charged Dynamo Gauge stock, the damage of the additional hits increase by 10%.\nPermanently increases Movement Speed by 30, Jump Power by 15, and Max Movement Speed by 20.
primary.desc: Whenever you have at least 1 Dynamo Gauge bar, when you attack with your Arm Cannon, you will deal an additional attack
details: The damage of the attack increases depending on your Dynamo Gauge
[Passive]: Permanently increases Movement Speed, Jump and Max Movement Speed

primary.name: Double Blast
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 20, Enemies Hit: 6, Damage: 130%, Number of Attacks: 4.\nUsing Revolving Cannon while using Double Blast will additionally attack the same number of enemies for 80% damage 3 times.
primary.desc: Performs two punches in front of you
details: Pressing twice will also trigger this skill
Can use Revolving Cannon while attacking

primary.name: Bobbing
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 9, Bonus Avoidability 35% applied for 1.5 sec after activation.\nMagnum Punch damage +90% points.
primary.desc: Dashes forward while avoiding enemy attacks
details: You gain increased %Avoidability after dashing
You can jump to cancel the dash
If activated after charging (pressing down), any skill that was already activated will be immediately canceled and you will dash forward
[Passive]: Permanently increases %p Damage of

primary.name: Arm Cannon Boost
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 11, Duration: 200 sec, Weapon Attack Speed: +2
primary.desc: Increases Attack Speed (by 2 stages)

primary.name: Arm Cannon Mastery
primary.shortDesc: Mastery +50%, Critical Rate +30%, and Attack Power +20

primary.name: Physical Training
primary.shortDesc: Permanently increase STR by 30 and DEX by 30.

primary.name: Charge Mastery
primary.shortDesc: Decreases the charge time for all charge skills by 15%. Using a charge skill reloads 1 Ammo immediately but will not reload while in midair or interrupt an auto-reload.\nAt the start of charged Bobbing, Weaving, or Hammer Smash, all damage taken is briefly reduced by 20%, including attacks that deal damage based on your Max HP.\nPermanently increases damage by 20%.
primary.desc: Decreases the charge time required for all Charge Skills (marked by a 'C' on icon)
details: Using a Charge Skill will also reload your Ammo by 1 immediately but will not interrupt auto-reload
After using any Charge Skill, you will briefly gain increased %Damage Reduction (including %Max HP attacks)
[Passive]: Permanently increases %Damage

primary.name: Revolving Cannon Plus
primary.shortDesc:
Bunker Buster Explosion damage +20% points, Shockwave 1 damage +40% points
Additional attack damage due to overheating +20% points, Revolving Cannon damage during Magnum Punch +40% points
Maximum Dynamo Gauge capacity expanded to 4 bars, maximum number of Ammo increased to 4.
Using Bunker Buster Explosion while the Dynamo Gauge is at 4 bars or higher increases damage by 40% points and will generate Shockwave 2, which attacks up to 10 enemies for 100% damage 6 times.
primary.desc: Increases the %p Damage of , , and of during
details:
Additionally increases the capacity of your Ammo and Dynamo Gauge
  • Using at 4 bars or higher will increase the %Damage of the skill and create a more powerful attack

primary.name: Hammer Smash
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 25, Max Number of Enemies: 8, Damage: 200%. Attacks 6 times. Applies Debuff on Hit: for 10 seconds, Final Damage taken from Blaster's attack +10%.\nWhen releasing charge, creates a shockwave that lasts for 5 sec and hits up to 8 enemies for 150% damage 2 times. Enemies struck by the shockwave will be afflicted by the Final Damage debuff.\nDouble Blast Damage +90% points.
primary.desc: Strikes the ground creating a damaging shockwave around you that debuffs enemies
details: [Debuff]: Enemies take increased %Final Damage from Blaster
[Passive]: Permanently increases %p Damage of
While charging, attacks won't knock you back
Shockwave is not affected by Damage Reflect

primary.name: Weaving
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 9, Bonus Avoidability 35% applied for 1.5 sec after activation.\nMagnum Punch damage +105% points.
primary.desc: Dashes backward while avoiding enemy attacks
details: You gain increased %Avoidability after dashing
You can jump to cancel the dash
If activated after charging (pressing down), any skill that was already activated will be immediately canceled and you will dash forward
[Passive]: Permanently increases %p Damage of

primary.name: Rocket Rush
primary.shortDesc: MP cost: 28, grab onto a maximum of 1 enemies and deal 140% Damage 2 times. After the grab, push back up to 15 nearby enemies while dealing 140% damge.
primary.desc: Dashes forward grabbing onto the first enemy hit while pushing back enemies
details: Pressing the Skill Key again while dashing will activate Magnum Launch

primary.name: Magnum Launch
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 10, Damage: 180%, Number of Attacks: 6, Max Enemies Hit: 15
primary.desc: Throws the enemy you are holding with that damages enemies it passes through

primary.name: Revolving Cannon Plus II
primary.shortDesc:
Bunker Buster Explosion damage +60% points, Shockwave 1 damage +80% points, and Shockwave 2 damage +40% points
Additional attack damage due to overheating +60% points, Revolving Cannon damage during Magnum Punch +60% points, Revolving Cannon damage during Double Blast +20% points
Maximum Dynamo Gauge capacity expanded to 5 slots, maximum number of Bullets increased to 5.
Using Bunker Buster Explosion while the Dynamo Gauge is at 5 slots or higher increases its damage by 80% points and will generate Shockwave 3, which attacks up to 10 enemies for 180% damage 6 times.
details: Increases %p Damage of , , and 's damage during and

Capacity of your Ammo and Dynamo Gauge is increased once more
  • Using at 5 bars or higher will increase the %Damage of the skill and create a more powerful attack

primary.name: Shield Training
primary.shortDesc: When hit, convert 40% of damage taken into a protective shield. 40% + 50 of the shield dissipates each second. The maximum potential for the shield is equal to your Max HP.\nPermanently increases Abnormal Status Resistance by 20 and Elemental Resistance by 20%.
primary.desc: When hit, you convert a portion of the damage taken into a shield that slowly disappears
details: [Passive]: Permanently increases Abnormal Status Resistance and %Elemental Resistance

primary.name: Combo Training
primary.shortDesc: Can be stacked up to 10 times. Duration: 10 sec. Final Damage increased by 3% per stack, Attack Speed increased by 1 for every 6 stacks, Skill Link Speed increased by 1 for every 10 stacks.\nPermanently increases Attack Power by 15%
primary.desc: Whenever you link two skills, you gain a stacking buff of %Final Damage (up to 10 stacks)
details: Every 6 stacks, you gain increased Attack Speed (by 1 stage)
Every 10 stacks, increased Link Speed between linking skills
Additionally, permanently increases %Attack

primary.name: Shotgun Punch
primary.shortDesc: MP cost: 70, Max Number of Enemies: 6, Damage: 265%, Number of Attacks: 6. Generates a shockwave that attacks up to 6 enemies for 140% damage 4 times\nIncreases Double Blast damage by 140% points.
primary.desc: Punches forward creating a powerful blast that creates a shockwave
details: [Passive]: Permanently increases %p Damage of

primary.name: Muzzle Flash
primary.shortDesc: MP cost: 25, Maximum Number of Enemies: 6, Damage: 500%, Number of Attacks: 3\nMagnum Punch damage +160% points
primary.desc: Instantly dashes to a nearby enemy while using
details:
Can only be used during
  • Pressing while dashing will activate Muzzle Flash
Will not activate if there are no enemies in range
[Passive]: Permanently increases %p Damage of

primary.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 0, Max Enemies Hit: 12, Damage: 1250%, Duration: 6 sec. Upon using this skill, deliver a jumping uppercut that hits up to 12 enemies for 1250% damage 5 times and sends them flying.
You can move around, using the arrow keys, while holding the skill key down.
If the attack succeeds, combo training remains at max level.
Hammer Smash Damage, aside from ShockWave, +195% points
Cooldown: 45 sec
primary.desc: Creates a cyclone around you that pulls in nearby enemies
details: At the end of the attack, you perform an uppercut attack
You can move while holding down the Skill Key
[Passive]: Permanently increases %p Damage of

primary.name: Revolving Blast
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 200, Rushes and grabs enemies for 230% damage. Stuns. Hits 2 times. Activate Revolving Cannon to attack up to 10 more enemies up to 6 times. Each attack hits 4 time(s) for 200%, 220%, 240%, 260%, 280%, or 300% damage.\nBonus Bunker Buster deals 350% damage 8 times and ignores additional 80% Defense Rate.\nCooldown: 150 sec
primary.desc: Dashes to the enemy with the highest Max HP while grabbing and binding them
details: Also fully reloads your Ammo
While you grab the enemy, you are invincible but immobile
Consumes all of your Dynamo Gauge

Can use Revolving Cannon while attacking to create a series of explosions
  • After using 6 times, you can cast that deals increased %Damage

primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 100, recovers HP equal to the sum of the dissipated Blast Shield and 50% of your Max HP. The extended defense period lasts for 15 sec.\nMagnum Launch damage increased by 150% points.\nCooldown: 200 sec.
primary.desc: Converts your active into HP
details: Cannot be used if there is no or if your HP is full

Briefly after casting, you take reduced damage, including %Max HP damage
  • Amount reduced is based on
[Passive]: Permanently increases %p Damage of

primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, Cooldown: 360 sec
primary.desc: Removes certain abnormal status effects and become immune to Abnormal Status for a few seconds

primary.name: Revolving Cannon Plus III
primary.shortDesc:
Bunker Buster Explosion damage +120% points, Shockwave 1 damage +170% points, Shockwave 2 damage +130% points, and Shockwave 3 damage +90% points
Additional attack damage due to overheating +140% points, Revolving Cannon damage during Magnum Punch +140% points, Revolving Cannon damage during Double Blast +100% points
Maximum Dynamo Gauge capacity expanded to 6 slots, maximum number of Bullets increased to 6.
Using Bunker Buster Explosion while the Dynamo Gauge is at 6 slots or higher increases its damage by 150% points and will generate Shockwave 4, which attacks up to 10 enemies for 320% damage 6 times.
details: Increases %p Damage of , , and 's damage during and

Capacity of your Ammo and Dynamo Gauge is increased once more
  • Using at 6 bars or higher will increase the %Damage of the skill and create a more powerful attack

primary.name: Shield Training II
primary.shortDesc: When hit, convert 50% of damage taken into a protective shield. 40% + 50 of the shield dissipates each second. The maximum potential for the shield is equal to your Max HP.\nPermanently increases Abnormal Status Resistance by 20% and Elemental Resistance by 20%.\nRocket Rush damage +80% points.
details: Increases amount of damage converted
Increases Abnormal Status and %Elemental Resistance provided
Now increases %p Damage of

primary.shortDesc: Mastery: +70%, Critical Damage: +15%, Boss Damage: +15%
details: Increases %Weapon Mastery provided
Now increases %Crit Damage and %Boss Damage

primary.name: Advanced Charge Mastery
primary.shortDesc: Decreases the charge time for all charge skills by 40%. Using a charge skill reloads 2 Ammo immediately but will not reload while in midair or interrupt an auto-reload.\nImmediately after using charged Bobbing, Weaving, or Hammer Smash, all damage taken is briefly reduced by 35%, including attacks that deal damage based on your Max HP.\nPermanently ignore 35% of enemies' Defense, and damage taken is reduced by 15%.
details: Increases the amount of charge time decreased and amount of Ammo reloaded from 1 to 2
Increases amount of damage reduced after using charged skills
Now increases %Ignore DEF and %Damage Reduction

primary.name: Combo Training II
primary.shortDesc: Can be stacked up to 10 times. Duration: 10 sec. Final Damage and Critical Rate increased by 6% and 3% respectively per stack, Attack Speed increased by 1 for every 6 stacks, Skill Link Speed increased by 1 for every 5 stacks.\nPermanently increases Attack Power by 40
details: Increases %Final Damage provided per stack and now increases %Crit Rate per stack
Reduces amount of stacks required for Skill Link Speed increase
Now grants flat Attack

hyperPassive.name: Aftershock Punch
hyperPassive.desc: Increases the number of hits from the shockwaves created from and

hyperPassive.name: Power Punch
hyperPassive.desc: Increases the %Damage of , , , , , and

hyperPassive.name: Piercing Punch
hyperPassive.desc: Increases the %Ignore DEF of , , , , , and

hyperPassive.name: Improved Bunker Shockwave
hyperPassive.desc: Increases %Damage of the explosion after the initial hit

hyperPassive.name: Bunker Buster Explosion - Guard Bonus
hyperPassive.shortDesc: Guard bonus during Bunker Buster Explosion. Damage reduction rate follows the rates in Charge Mastery.

hyperPassive.name: Blast Shield Recovery
hyperPassive.shortDesc: Recover 50% of the dissipating Blast Shield as HP.

hyperActive.name: Cannon Overdrive
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 200. Duration: 35 sec. Increases damage for skills that use Ammo by 50%. Ammo auto-reload time decreased by 70%. The Dynamo Gauge Overheat duration for Bunker Buster Explosion is reduced to 1 second.\nCooldown : 240 sec.
hyperActive.desc: Increases the %Damage of skills that use Ammo and reduces the Ammo auto-reload time
details: While active, duration of the Dynamo Gauge Overheat is also reduced slightly

hyperActive.name: Hyper Magnum Punch
hyperActive.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 400, Attacks up to 15 enemies for 500% 15 times.
Generates a shockwave that attacks for 250% damage 8 times.
Can be enhanced up to 3 levels by charging, and each level of enhancement generates an additional shockwave that deals 350%, 450%, 550% damage 8 times.
While charging, the defense boosts from Charge Mastery are applied, and Abnormal Status Resistance increases by 100.
Each time you get hit while charging, the final damage increases by 5%, up to 50%.
Can be charged for up to 4 sec.
Cooldown: 150 sec.
Shotgun Punch deals +30% damage to normal monsters once Hyper Magnum Punch is obtained.
hyperActive.desc: Unleashes a powerful explosive punch in front of you
details: You generate more shockwaves depending on how long the Skill Key was held
While charging, the effects of are activated and you gain increased Abnormal Status Resistance
While charging, you gain increased %Final Damage whenever you are hit

hyperActive.name: For Liberty
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 100, Duration: 60 sec, Damage: +10%\nCooldown: 120 sec. Only applies to Demon, Resistance, and Xenon party members.

fifthMain.name: Rocket Punch
fifthMain.shortDesc: MP Cost: 1000, Duration: 45 sec. Using your arm cannon while active triggers Revolving Cannon Boost, which uses special ammunition. Does not apply to 5th Job Advancement skills.\nMax Enemies Hit: 10, Damage: 355%, Number of Attacks: 8, Enemy DEF Ignored: 100%\nCooldown: 120 sec
fifthMain.desc: While active, your attacks trigger additional explosions
details: will be replaced while this skill is active
The explosion will consume 1 Ammo
Attack has 100% Ignore DEF

fifthMain.name: Gatling Punch
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 60, Max Enemies Hit: 10, Damage: 1000%, Number of Attacks: 12. Deals 850% damage 8 times consecutively for up to 4 sec while the key is held.
Grants the Enhanced Guard effects of Charge Mastery and Combo Training with max stacks.
Final damage increases by 10% every hit up to 100%.
Cooldown: 60 sec
fifthMain.desc: Throws a rapid barrage of punches out in front of you
details: Activates effects of and at max stack
Deals increased %Final Damage for every hit (up to 100%)

fifthMain.name: Bullet Blast
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 1000, Ammo Cost: 1
Can prepare for up to 5 sec, adds up to 5 bullets by using the Revolving Cannon, launches an explosion in proportion to the number of bullets used after Charge when the key is released. Invincible during preparation and Charge. Combo Training remains at the max level while casting skill.
Charge: Max Enemies Hit: 12, Damage: 3000%, Number of Attacks: 15
Explosion: Max Enemies Hit: 12, Damage: 2400%, Number of Attacks: 15
All hits receive Additional Critical Rate: +100% and Additional Monster DEF Ignored: +100%
Cooldown: 100 sec
fifthMain.desc: Dashes forward and creates a massive explosion behind you
details: Consumes 1 Ammo

While holding down the Skill Key, using will consume additional Ammo (up to 5) to create a more powerful explosion
  • You are invincible while charging
Activates the effects of and remains at max stack while casting
Attack has increased %100 Ignore DEF and is a guaranteed Critical Hit

fifthMain.name: Afterimage Shock
fifthMain.shortDesc: Cooldown: 240 seconds.\n Active Effect: MP Cost: 1,000. Upon successful hits with Arm Cannon's direct attacks, this skill creates afterimages that deal 5 additional attacks with 900% damage for 180 seconds. Afterimages can be created up to 99 times. Reoccurrence Cooldown: 0.1 second\n Passive Effect: During Afterimage Shock's cooldown, upon successful hits with the Arm Cannon, this skill creates afterimages, which attack up to 7 enemies that have not been hit with 1,000% damage up to 3 times. Active and Passive Effects cannot trigger simultaneously. Reoccurrence Cooldown: 6 seconds.
fifthMain.desc: While active, an additional attack will appear whenever you use a Gauntlet Revolver attack
details: Additional attack can only appear up to 99 times
[Passive]: While the skill is on cooldown, Gauntlet Revolver attacks create a different additional attack that damages nearby enemies

meta: Blaster is a STR warrior class part of the Resistance class group. Blasters are known to be high-APM compared to other classes and have a big learning curve. Additionally, Blasters have two additional types of resources, Ammo and a Dynamo Gauge. Certain skills will consume Ammo to use and charge up your Dynamo Gauge to unleash powerful attacks
